Description: PCF element that is a navigation target. Not visual, but can contain visual screen containers. Use system permissions to determine user read/write access.
Contain a single screen. Used esxclusively within location groups.
Collection of pages, each with their own screen. Grouped pages share a common navigation interface, such as sidebar, menu and tab bar.
Ordered collection of screens to execute a complex business process. Screens are ordered and the process is stepwise.
Contains single screen and mimics the behavior of browser windows. Contains navigation link to previous screen.
Contains single screen rendered in workspace frame.
Logic executed upon navigation request. Often used to conditionally determine navigation target.
Navigation link to external URL. Often used to access other applications or websites. Not displayed as screen widget.
